entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 then light early in the afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Flurries or drizzle early in the evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
